tool.name: ExtractFromSDFiles
tool.description: extract data from file according to field name and Ids

param.name: inputsdf
param.label: Original SDF File
param.help: sdf file from which selected ids of molecules need to be extracted.

param.name: Identifier
param.label: Field name
param.help: Give field name of molecules on which compound need to be extracted Ex. MolID,PUBCHEM_COMPOUND_ID,CID etc.

param.name: indexnumbers
param.label: Id file which need to be extracted from dataset
param.help: select file of ids ie. result file obtained from the tool 'Extract IDs From Prediction Result'
